title: Ticket #7388: Initial pass at associating input files with a JobSet
description:
We the ability to associate input files shared across a group of jobs as a property of a JobSet, such that multiple jobs from the same JobSet running on the same server will only need to transfer the set's input files once.

Design document forthcoming.
